FuncDef:
The bier load-balance-entropy command enables entropy for BIER load balancing in NG MVPN scenarios.
The undo bier load-balance-entropy command disables entropy for BIER load balancing in NG MVPN scenarios.
By default, entropy is disabled for load balancing.
ParentView: VPN instance IPv4 address family MVPN view

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the (S, G)-based load balancing entropy mode.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable entropy for load balancing when multicast traffic is carried over BIER on an NG MVPN, run the bier load-balance-entropy command.
